reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Arriving in Damen at nightfall we checked into the Everest Panorma Resort 3km above the town, attracted by the promise of a luxurious nights accommodation with great views of the entire Himalayas in the morning. Whilst the views were indeed superb, this possibly once grand resort provides very substandard grubby accommodation, with stained carpets, poor bathrooms and rock hard pillows and grimy bedding. Although accommodation of this standard is not unusual in Nepal, at a non-negotiable USD80/night this place is grossly overpriced. Only the thought of a three hour drive down the mountain roads in the dark persuaded us to stay.
reviews.title: Great views, shame about the hotel
